allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
fix: Regenerate package-lock.json with correct p-limit@4.0.0

The previous package-lock.json had p-limit@3.1.0 even though package.json specified ^4.0.0. This caused Railway to install the wrong version, leading to ESM/CommonJS compatibility issues.

Regenerated lockfile by:
- Removing node_modules and package-lock.json
- Running npm install fresh
- Verifying p-limit@4.0.0 is correctly locked

This should resolve the ERR_REQUIRE_ESM error on Railway deployment.

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
